title: The Sagas of Noggin The Nog
description:
Noggin the Nog is a popular British children's character appearing in his own TV series (of the same name) and series of illustrated books, the brainchild of Oliver Postgate and Peter Firmin. The TV series is considered a "cult classic" from the golden age of British children's television. Noggin himself is a simple, kind and unassuming King of the Northmen in a roughly Viking-age setting, with various fantastic elements such as dragons, flying machines and talking birds.

Contains all 7 episodes and 8 storybooks found on DVD.


Episodes:
[01] The Saga of Noggin the Nog (King of the Nogs) [B&W][1959] - 6 Episodes
[02] Noggin and the Ice Dragon [B&W][1961] - 6 Episodes
[03] Noggin and the Flying Machine [B&W][1963] - 3 Episodes
[04] Noggin and the Omruds [B&W][1964] - 3 Episodes
[05] Noggin and the Fire Cake [B&W][1965] - 3 Episodes
[06] Noggin and the Ice Dragon [Color][1982] - 4 Episodes
[07] Noggin and the Pie [Color][1982] - 2 Episodes

Storybooks:
[01] Noggin the King
[02] Noggin and the Whale
[03] Noggin and the Dragon
[04] Nogbad Comes Back
[05] Noggin and the Moon Mouse
[06] Nogbad and the Elephants
[07] Noggin and the Money
[08] Noggin and the Storks
